data.text: @LAUSDSup please follow the advice of the health officials & the science - the teachers union is neither! mask optional please! 🙏🏽 science over politics. we are done with hygiene-theatre!!!!
@clintcarlton @LAUSDSup @LASchools Until the union is paid off….THEN the mask mandate will be lifted #ourkidsarentyourpawns

@LAUSDSup Our high vaccination rate, regular testing and low transmission rates check all the boxes needed to lift the mask mandates.  Do not let the corrupt teachers union use our kids as their financial pawns.  It’d be awesome if you would stand up to the union though HIGHLY doubtful.

@PST4LAPublicEd @sarahbeth345 @UTLAUncensored @LAUSDSup That’s because u kick out any member who does not share your extreme Covid measures for kids but yet claim u r the “largest parent advocacy group for LAUSD parents”. Yeah, We all see through u. Myself and any other parent I know who wanted kids back In School were kicked out

@TeresaGaines @LAUSDSup The low rate should prove something.......parents don't want their child to get a vaccine that is not yet fully-approved.  It is only authorized under an emergency use.  It means it has not been completely vetted.

@LAUSDSup Dear superintendent, can you please clarify what additional data or which authority’s blessing you need in order to lift this mask mandate? It appears the existing health authorities’ guidance is insufficient for you.  What add’l data do you need, & from whom? Thank you.
@LAUSDSup Please allow for Mask Choice!!! It's that simple!!!  those who want to wear it can still wear it.... And those who don't can CHOOSE not to!!!! No politics!!!!
